title: New: Apes & Horses – Seas
content:
I feel like I’ve been waiting forever for new material from Parisian quintet Apes & Horses.

Having blown me away with their two debut tracks back in July 2012, the dream-pop outfit are back with new track Seas, lifted from their forthcoming new EP Bleu Nuit, and it doesn’t disappoint. Again merging the WU LYF edge with elegant, shoegaze flecks, Apes & Horses are now ready to hit the big time.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
